// Pivot 0, 0
int first_light[14] = {
	273, 86,
	267, 90,
	267, 117,
	273, 122,
	279, 117,
	279, 90,
	273, 86
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float first_light[14] = {
	0.455000f, 0.095556f,
	0.445000f, 0.100000f,
	0.445000f, 0.130000f,
	0.455000f, 0.135556f,
	0.465000f, 0.130000f,
	0.465000f, 0.100000f,
	0.455000f, 0.095556f
};
